sentences.sContent: Their mouths were full of gypsum.
sentences.sCn: 他们的嘴里叼满了石膏。

sentences.sContent: Under the circumstances, gypsum or anhydrite Co. ld accumulate to form beds many meters thick, without any Co. precipitation of halite.
sentences.sContent_eng: Under the circumstances, gypsum or anhydrite Co. ld accumulate to form beds many meters thick, without any Co. precipitation of halite.
sentences.sCn: 在这种环境下，石膏或硬石膏可以堆积成许多米厚的岩层，而没有任何石盐伴生沉淀。

phrases.pCn: 石膏灰泥，石膏抹面；石膏胶凝材料；粉饰用石膏粉
石膏块材，石膏砌块；石膏块

trans.tranOther: a soft white substance that is used to make  plaster of paris
